[[Emily Waltham's second husband|unnamed cousin-in-law]]}}This unnamed guy is the cousin of [[Emily Waltham]]. He is not at all seen and is first mentioned in "[[The One With The Yeti]]" when [[Ross Geller|Ross]] announces to the gang that he's renting [[Ross' Second Apartment|this apartment]] from him. In "[[The One Where Ross Moves In]]" after breaking up with Emily, he beats Ross up and kicks him out of the apartment. ==Appearances== * "[[The One With The Yeti]]" (First mentioned) * "[[The One Where Ross Moves In]]" (Mentioned only) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Unseen Characters]] [[Category:Non-Americans]] [[Category:English Characters]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Characters]]
